info.author: BuzzTroll
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description:
Convert web documentation to a pdf with a single command.  This was written specifically to fetch 'Thinking in C++
into a format that I could read on a nook.
info.keywords: http html pdf index documentation convert
info.name: buzzweb2pdf
info.summary: An Open Source tool to convert HTML documentation with an index page into a single PDF.
info.html_description: Convert web documentation to a pdf with a single command. This was written specifically to fetch ‘Thinking in C++ into a format that I could read on a nook.
